body: Our platform supports the following file types: PDF (Portable Document Format), DOCX (Microsoft Word Document) and PPTX (Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation)
title: What document types can I upload

body: Yes, you can be quizzed on a specific topic of your choice. AI Examiner recommends topics based on the content you upload and further provides the option to choose a single topic or multiple topics from the list generated by the system.
title: Can i be quizzed on just a particular topic?

body: Yes, AI Examiner provides detailed explanations for all questions you answer incorrectly. Understanding why an answer is incorrect is crucial for learning and improvement. When you get a question wrong, you will receive a thorough explanation that breaks down the correct answer and clarifies the key concepts.
title: Will I get explanations to questions I get wrong?
